Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Vancomycin (0.25 - 128 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive cocci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Vancomycin for determining antimicrobial susceptibility in gram-positive cocci.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive cocci, including vancomycin susceptibility for Enterococcus, Staphylococcus, and Streptococcus species.
